code: import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../constants/urls";import{goToRecipesList}from"../routes/coordinator";export var login=function login(body,clear,navigate,setRightButtonText,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();setIsLoading(false);goToRecipesList(navigate);setRightButtonText("Logout");}).catch(function(err){setIsLoading(false);alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var signUp=function signUp(body,clear,navigate,setRightButtonText,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/signup"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();setIsLoading(false);goToRecipesList(navigate);setRightButtonText("Logout");}).catch(function(err){setIsLoading(false);alert(err.response.data.message);});};
